entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who is trying to remain hidden and observe the scene.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who tries to get his attention behind him.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: The dying man whose white face and black eyes are described in the text.

relationships.description: Hermione is behind Harry, trying to get his attention.
Harry sees Snape's white face and black eyes as he tries to remain hidden.
Snape pulls Harry close with his hands on the front of his robes.
Harry feels a mix of emotions as he sees Snape, including hatred and possibly concern.
